steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
with 4 as hexLength
match (o:esco__Occupation)
[token:whereClause]
unwind o.skos__prefLabel as prefLabel
with o, prefLabel, hexLength, '0x' + right( o.uri, hexLength) as baseHexCode
with o, prefLabel, hexLength, baseHexCode, toLower(apoc.text.hexValue(apoc.convert.toInteger(baseHexCode))) as replacementChars, left(right( o.uri, 36),36 - hexLength) as trimmedUri, 0 as zero
with o, prefLabel, hexLength, replacementChars, baseHexCode, trimmedUri + case size(replacementChars) when hexLength then replacementChars else 1/zero end as newUri
create (al:OccupationLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: prefLabel, uri: "<<contentapiprefix>>/occupationlabel/" + newUri})
create (o)-[:hasPrefLabel]->(al)
